title: Sell Request
description: Sell a Contract as identified by the contract_id.

sell.description: Pass contract_id received from the `portfolio` call.

price.description: Minimum price at which to sell the contract, or `0` for 'sell at market'.

passthrough.description: Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: Used to map request to response.
